title: Game and CPU complete freeze at the start of a match
body: Ever since i got the windows 10 update recently, my game keeps crashing and causes my computer to completely freeze which forces me to shut it down entirely, but everything is running smoothly such as the launcher and everything else but only when i start a game and the first spawn is when the game completely freezes. I have uninstalled the program and reinstalled it but the same problem keeps happening, i'm not sure if it's the windows update or the game itself but i'd really like to know what I should do about this situation. I'm not sure if i'm the only person experiencing this however if i'm not the only person please comment below and if you have any suggestions to what i should do. Please let me know

replies.body:
The Windows 10 Anniversary update enabled the Game DVR feature in the Xbox Game Bar, which is causing system freezes in-game for some players. I suggest [disabling the game bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it resolves the freezing.

Let me know if this helped.
This helped a lot it fixed it thank you so much :D
I have been experiencing this too. Really starting to annoy me
This only happened after the new windows 10 update right?
I believe so yes, i just made a post about it as well on this forum. It was working fine until couple days ago, where I'm guessing is when I updated it.
